main event: Unidentified flying object observed ascending and around Hawthorne, New Jersey on October 31, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object was observed by a member of NICAP., It was reported that the object ascended in the vicinity of Hawthorne., Multiple citizens reported UFO sightings in Clifton, Paterson, and Hawthorne on multiple dates in September 1962., Two patrolmen reported seeing strange lights in the sky on September 15, 1962.
witness description: NICAP member and patrolmen from the Hawthorne Police Department
